name: Dungeon Game WIP
description:
This is a short dungeon tile map game made in a few hours, for the fun of it. I was just playing around with some stuff and my mind just clicked and boom i knew how to use tile maps. 

TUTORIAL-  

Use wasd to move around. 

Purple space is you, 

Red spaces are walls, 

blue spaces are empty spaces (can be moved into), 

black spaces are enemies which damage scale per level you are one, 

silver spaces (maybe light blue to you) are chest which will give you a boost (look at bottm where it says item information for more informaition), 

and gold spaces take you to the next level.

Click any items on the right to use it. It will also display the amount you have.

NOTE-

Download the file to use the map editor, look through the comments in the javascript file you will see the spawn arrays and the map arrays.
